content: stolen bike socks sizes 56 64 72 sts yarn 100g/400m of fingering weight yarn i have used sock yarn from linday knits but feel free to use any fingering weight yarn gauge 18sts=2 5cm needles 2 5mm or whatever size you need to obtain gauge i knit my socks using the magic loop method but please use whatever needles you are comfortable with notions tapestry needle stitch markers abbreviations p purl k knit k2tog knit 2 together ssk slip slip knit p2tog purl 2 together sl1wyif slip 1 stitch purl wise with yarn in front bor beginning of round sts stitches *_* repeat what is between until instructed to do otherwise pm place marker ktbl knit 1 through back loop i have written the instructions for the heel flap and wedge toe but if you prefer to knit another heel or toe feel free to do so cuff cast on 56 64 72 sts join in around being careful not to twist it round1 *k2 p2* repeat 14 16 18 times i repeated round 1 15 times but feel free to work it until you have reached your desired length 1 leg for an in-the-round chart every row on the chart is a right side row so each row is read from right to left and from bottom to top chart a is worked across the first 28 32 36 sts chart b is worked across the last 28 32 36 sts on the leg after the heel these sts will be worked as stockinette stitch work charts a and b until you have reached your desired length chart a 56sts 64sts 72sts 2 chart b 56sts 64sts 72sts heel work your favorite heel or follow my instructions for the heel when you have finished the heel continue to all sizes ​ heel flap the heel flap is worked across the last 28 32 36 stitches row 1 sl1wyif knit across to the last stitch k1tbl turn work row 2 sl1wyif purl across to the last stitch k1tbl turn work repeat row 1 and 2 for a total of 16 times 32 row heel turn row 1 sl1wyif k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn row 2 sl1wyif p 7 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl1wyif knit to one stitch before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl1wyif purl to one stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches have been worked 3 knit across and pick up 17 gusset sts if you need to pick up an extra stitch in the ladder between the stitches on the row below knit next round of chart a across the next 28 32 36 again if you need to you can pick up an extra stitch in the ladder pick up 17 sts k 8 9 10 pm center of the heel this is now bor gusset round 1 knit to 3 stitches before instep k2tog k1 knit in pattern across the next 28 32 36
